name: Flow's Island
storyline:
The world, which has become an arid and deserted place, can no longer sustain life.
The last hope lies in the ancient legend of an island and the power of a she-wolf goddess capable of giving new life to nature. FlowTech, having failed all approaches with the tribes of the island, decides to send some dogs, genetically modified in intelligence, to try to get in touch with the natives and discover how to use this power.
summary: You are one of the strays created by a multinational company determined to seize the power that hides on a mysterious island. Collaborate, survive, fight for your place in the pack and discover the magical secret of the tribes living on the Flow's Island.
